Articles.Content:
Hello, everyone! I'm DeltaV_, the underscore being there because "DeltaV" was already taken. I've been a member for quite some time, but the infamous forum issues of a while back deleted a majority of my posts. After that, I lurked whilst logged in for a while before deciding to just make a new account and start fresh once more.

Anyways, it's nice to be sort-of back, or at least to be posting again. Hope to see you all around!
